summary: Arya edged backward away from the wagon. When she felt the hand on her shoulder, she whirled, bringing up her stick sword again,...
text:
Arya edged backward away from the wagon. When she felt the hand on her shoulder, she whirled, bringing up her stick sword again, but it was only the Bull. “What are you doing?”
He raised his hands defensively. “Yoren said none of us should go near those three.”
“They don’t scare me,” Arya said.
“Then you’re stupid. They scare me.” The Bull’s hand fell to the hilt of his sword, and Rorge began to laugh. “Let’s get away from them.”
Arya scuffed at the ground with her foot, but she let the Bull lead her around to the front of the inn.

blog.name: asongofstarkandtargaryen
blog.title: Dracarys!
blog.description: Jon/Dany/Bran/Arya Stan. Salty about the got ending. Also likes: The 100,  Star Wars, Stranger Things.

tags: a post of ice and fire
summary: Arya will probably like Dany or at least be neutral towards her, Their biggest problem is the Others and Arya is a person who...
body:
Arya will probably like Dany or at least be neutral towards her,

Their biggest problem is the Others and Arya is a person who could always see the biggest picture. She knows that the North alone doesn’t have a chance and that they need help. And here comes Dany, a Queen with an army and two dragons and dragonglass willing to aid them. There is nothing to dislike about it.

Plus, the previous season made it clear that Arya loves and supports Jon the most. Jon trusts Dany and that will probably influence Arya’s opinion for her as well.

tags: a post of ice and fire
summary: I really want to see new material about Arya, however I suspect that even when the trailer drops we will be left starving. Think...
body:
I really want to see new material about Arya, however I suspect that even when the trailer drops we will be left starving.

Think about it, trailers usually featuring most clips from the season’s first episode in order not to spoil too many things. We already know that Jon, Dany and co. will arrive at Winterfell in the first episode. Which means that Arya’s scenes on that episode are reunions with characters that probably won’t be spoiled via a trailer.

Arya and Jon’s reunion? Literally, what everyone in the fandom has been waiting for years and also spoiler,

Arya’s reunion with Gendry and with the Hound? Spoiler.

Even Arya’s meeting with Daenerys, Tyrion and the rest and how she will react to all of them is a spoiler.

I only expect to see a couple of glimpses of Arya on the trailer that will be too generic as to not give away anything. And maybe a short clip of her holding her sword as she’s ready to fight? I don’t know.

In any case, if that means we’ll get lot of great Arya scenes within the season I don’t really mind her not featuring much on the trailers/promos (especially if that means that important reunions won’t be spoiled).

Just give our girl a great final season, HBO! As Maisie said, she’s the land woman standing.

blog.name: princessmissandei

blog.description: Marie | Slytherin | Writer About and Before You Follow Multi-fandom blog with an emphasis on ASOIAF and various period dramas. Very fond of canon Starks, Targaryens, Durrandons and Baratheons. Reylos do not engage.

summary: There's no reason Arya wouldn't welcome Daenerys or see her in anything but a neutral if not positive light. This is a woman who...
body:
There’s no reason Arya wouldn’t welcome Daenerys or see her in anything but a neutral if not positive light. This is a woman who risked her life and the lives of her dragons to rescue Jon Snow, the person Arya loves most and who loves her most. This is also the woman who will be key in helping to destroy the White Walkers and protect their people. In addition to that, all of Dany’s accomplishments and struggles would establish her as someone Arya would respect and look up to just as she admires Dany’s ancestors, Rhaenys and Visenya.

Not every female dynamic needs to be antagonistic.

In addition to that, all of Dany’s accomplishments and struggles would establish her as someone Arya would respect and look up to just as she admires Dany’s ancestors, Rhaenys and Visenya.
